Orphapacket.Label: Hypoplasia of the mitral valve annulus

TextSection.Contents: A rare congenital mitral valve malformation characterized by hypoplastic annulus which usually appears within a complete mitral valve hypoplasia causing mitral valve stenosis. Association with other cardiac malformation is common including coarctation of the aorta aortic valve stenosis Shone complex and hypoplastic left heart syndrome.

Parent.Label: Congenital mitral valve insufficiency and/or stenosis
